actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Ways and Means.

official_title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 to remove certain inequities relating to private foundations.

summary.text: Amends the Internal Revenue Code relating to the imposition of an excise tax on the excess business holdings of private foundations to permit a two percent variance in the increase or decrease in percentage holdings of the private foundation and all disqualified persons attributable to issuance or redemption of stock held on May 26, 1969.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 to remove certain inequities relating to private foundations.
